tasks.label: Start Mkdocs container
tasks.command:
docker run --rm -it -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs python:$(cat .python-version | tr -d '
')-alpine sh -c "apk add git && pip install -r /docs/requirements.txt && cd /docs && mkdocs serve -a '0.0.0.0:8000'"

tasks.label: Start Mkdocs (self-hosted) container
tasks.command:
git fetch origin self-hosted-releases && docker run --rm -it -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs python:$(cat .python-version | tr -d '
')-alpine sh -c "apk add git && git config --global --add safe.directory /docs && pip install -r /docs/requirements.txt && cd /docs && mike serve --branch self-hosted-releases -a '0.0.0.0:8000'"
